greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

especially in situations where they may be vulnerable or dependent on me
oppression.question: Did I through my words, actions, or interactions, mistreat or harass others, especially in situations where they may be vulnerable or dependent on me?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: by your deeds oppress , harass , or discriminate against others
oppression.question: Did you by your deeds oppress, harass, or discriminate against others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

of what they could provide for me ,
rather than seeing them as fellow human beings created in God 's image
as fellow human beings created in God 's image
lust.question: Did I view others primarily in terms of what they could provide for me, rather than seeing them as fellow human beings created in God's image?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

rather than seeing them as complex individuals created in God 's image
as complex individuals created in God 's image
lust.question: Did I view others in my life, including acquaintances and community members, primarily through the lens of their utility or usefulness to me, rather than seeing them as complex individuals created in God's image?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

envy.question: Have I envied others' blessings, perhaps wishing they wouldn't possess them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: such as their fulfilling relationships or successful careers
envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others' blessings, such as their fulfilling relationships or successful careers, would disappear so I could feel more content with my own life?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or inappropriate language, potentially violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking to others using words that were vulgar or inappropriate
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control in speaking to others using words that were vulgar or inappropriate, thereby disrespecting their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and use words that were hurtful to others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, even when attending social gatherings and events where food and drink are abundant?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, demonstrating an excessive attachment to sensual pleasures?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, thereby giving in to excessive desires and neglecting the need for self-control and moderation?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I shared the faults or private affairs of acquaintances, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.
